category: National Pension Review Committee Operation Regulations/Article 10 (Convocation, etc.)
contents: Article 10 (Convening, etc.) ① The chairman of the review committee convenes and chairs the meeting of the review committee (including video conferences; hereinafter the same shall apply). Newly established on September 16, 2022. ② When the chairman of the review committee wishes to hold a review committee, he/she shall submit a written document ( (including electronic documents pursuant to Article 2, Paragraph 7 of the Electronic Government Act). [Moved from Paragraph 1, Previous Paragraph 2 moved to Paragraph 3 September 16, 2022, September 16, 2022] ③ The notification under Paragraph 2 must be made at least 5 days prior to the meeting. However, if there are unavoidable reasons, the period may be shortened. [Moved from Paragraph 2, Previous Paragraph 3 moved to Paragraph 4 September 16, 2022, September 16, 2022] ④ When the Chairperson wishes to hold a review committee under Paragraph 2, he/she shall provide information on the date and time of the meeting, etc. The contents must be made public through the corporation's website, etc. [Moved from Paragraph 3 2022. 9. 16., 2022. 9. 16.]
